channel.title: Law in the news
channel.description:
This series focuses on current news stories that relate to the law.,No information available.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Federal Trade Commission
item.description: This program discusses the impact of the Federal Trade Commission on American lives.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: NAEB Regions III & IV: The Upper Midwest
